messages.text: Morning Keily üåû How‚Äôs your back today? Last week‚Äôs stretches going well?
Morning! Back feels great today, less stiffness than last month.
That‚Äôs a good sign üí™ Let‚Äôs increase plank holds by 10 seconds this week.
Got it, will try after work today.
Keily, add coconut water mid-morning. Prepping for Dubai heat.
Yes, I‚Äôll get some on my way to work.exercise 12 min hydration 1.3 litres steps 3.4k
Sleep avg last week: slept 7.4 hours ‚Äî stable.
Nice! Let‚Äôs aim for 7h 40m before your trip.
I‚Äôll try. Less late-night scrolling!
Dubai flights confirmed for July 16‚Äì19 ‚úàÔ∏è
Perfect. Need my heat-proof kit again?
Yes ‚Äî cooling towel, electrolyte sachets, and sunscreen SPF 50.
Also pack dates ‚Äî good quick energy in heat.
Diagnostic blood test due on 7th ‚Äî booked?
Yes, booked for Monday morning.
Will prep pre/post test instruction sheet.
Today: 12 min jog + 3 min cool-down walk.
Done! Sweaty but worth it. 4k steps exercise 15 min
Morning! Remember fasting for test today.
Yes, on the way to the clinic now.
Post-test breakfast: oatmeal + banana + nuts.
On it!
Test results expected tomorrow. Ready for review call?
Yes, block my lunch slot.
Results are in ‚Äî allergy markers down 35% since March üéâ
That‚Äôs amazing! Can feel it in daily life too.
Vitamin D slightly low ‚Äî let‚Äôs add weekly supplement.
Today: core & back session ‚Äî 3 sets bridges, 2 sets side planks.
Done! Side planks still tough but improving. exercise 20 min
Dubai packing list sent to your email.
Got it, will start packing Sunday.
Hydration goal during trip: hydration 3 litres /day.
Noted ‚Äî will keep bottle handy.
Travel day! Cooling towel packed?
Yes, and electrolytes too.hydration 1 litres
Step goal adjusted to 5k steps for travel day.
Breakfast in Dubai: yogurt + dates + almonds.
Easy to find here, I‚Äôll grab them now.
Light hotel room workout: 10 squats, 10 pushups, 15 bridges.
Done, felt great before meetings.exercise 30 min
Back home! Unpack tomorrow and rest.
Yes, heading straight to bed.
Dubai trip: avg 2.8L/day water, 6.1k steps/day ‚úÖ
Solid travel performance üëè
Keily, add watermelon slices post-workout this week.
Love that idea!hydration 1.5 litres
End-of-month goal: hold plank for 1 min.
Challenge accepted!
Keily, how‚Äôs stress level lately?
Work is hectic, but the morning walks help.
Great ‚Äî keep those walks non-negotiable.
July summary ready ‚Äî hydration up 18%, allergy symptoms lowest so far.
Fantastic month Keily, August will be about sustaining this momentum.

events.description: Checked allergy markers, vitamin levels, general health.

events.title: Dubai Work Trip
events.description: Managed hydration & heat exposure during business travel.
events.reason: Prevent dehydration & fatigue in extreme weather.
